Articles.Content: Right I forgot that haha it is PLZ-05 my brain deletes 0s automatically now I guess ill make sure the name is accurate in game.

> 3M54 Klub cruise missile

Yesssssssss
Any chance of the Moskit? (A.K.A. NATO reporting name - 'Sunburn')

> 
> Any chance of the Moskit? (A.K.A. NATO reporting name - 'Sunburn')

On the agenda as far as I know

> 
> I have to show china SOME love after all. The model is done just need do the texture etc. Im getting alot of work done these days so we should be looking at a release pretty soon. Also Israel and germany are making controbutions... And sweden for that matter
> - - - Updated - - -
>

Yes the AIM-7! I was just about to suggest that lol!
alright with the weekend mostly over I'm getting back to work.

Bug report: The BMP turret lacks a collision mesh or something. I can't place it on my craft, and when I try to pick it up, it doesn't register any clicks on that part.

Also: Russian anti-ship SSM please.

> 
> Bug report: The BMP turret lacks a collision mesh or something. I can't place it on my craft, and when I try to pick it up, it doesn't register any clicks on that part.
> Also: Russian anti-ship SSM please.

The T-90ms turret has the same issues.

- - - Updated - - -

Also, it is impossible to place the radar pod.

- - - Updated - - -

With the nodes, I mean.

Update: im going to stop making more weapons for this update once the TOW is done I just dont have enough time right now especially since I have alot of bugfixes to get to work on as well. That being said R-12 is still a huge update. The other parts I had planned will be released in smaller updates following this one. Once I get finished testing I will release ASAP.
Update: most things are working and most fixes are done however it seems having two exhaust particles makes the part not load. this seems odd since i could have sworn i did that before.
Lots of school stuff right now still fighting the particle bug. I really want to get this out before november 10th or it will be a long time.
What uses the 'Tungsten Shells' and 'AT Rockets' ammo boxes?
Tungsten shells are for the NKD railgun and ATRockets are unused right now

Not sure if this has been reported but the Tomahawk Cruise Missile consistently misses for me at longer ranges.

I'm firing at a target about 20KM out (KSP to Island Tower using GPS Coordinates) and it looks like its just going too fast to turn into target. I have it set to cruise at 500m and by the time its getting to target its travelling at 500 m/s
lots of personal stuff right now guys I'll do what i can

> 
> lots of personal stuff right now guys I'll do what i can

Personal life comes before strangers on the internet, we'll wait

Anyone know if there's a way to setup in a missile cfg to automatically set "decouple direction" to either forward or lateral?

Edit

JellyCubes answered it. Its "decoupleForward = true'

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-04T19:08:32Z" title="11/04/2015 07:08  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 4, 2015</time> by V8jester**

For whatever reason I'm just getting the missiles and bombs. Are the guns in some type of folder in the advanced sorting part of the VAB/SPH parts menu? (Translation: Do I have to sort it by manufacturer or something?)

> 
> For whatever reason I'm just getting the missiles and bombs. Are the guns in some type of folder in the advanced sorting part of the VAB/SPH parts menu? (Translation: Do I have to sort it by manufacturer or something?)

Guns? You mean the turrets? There are no stand alone guns in this pack
Yeah, I meant the turrets. That's what I meant.

> 
> Yeah, I meant the turrets. That's what I meant.

They are in the BD category.

> 
> They are in the BD category.

You mean the manufacturer? Oh. Cra-beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeepppp. Maybe I should've searched there for the NAS and CAL stuff...

> 
> You mean the manufacturer? Oh. Cra-beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeepppp. Maybe I should've searched there for the NAS and CAL stuff...

Not manufacturer. Here's a pic:

> 
> ![x4XIF8b.png](http://i.imgur.com/x4XIF8b.png)
> 
> 

It is the category currently open, visible when sorted by function/using basic mode.

So you see, I only go on the forums on my school computer-my game computer is only used for games, I don't have time for forum browsing on it- and imgur is blocked on school computers. so all I see is a tiny bookmarked page with a little mountain and a cloud. if you imgur and imgur albums just leave me trying to use my imagination. essentially I have to spend most time reading stuff with pics here being blind. only when they use stuff other than imgur can I see it. You're going to have to upload something directly from steam to the post for me to see it. or possibly put it on a google doc and send it to me.

Events have transpired and I will not be returning to KSP modding for awhile. When 1.1 comes out I will try to find the time to update but my future content plans are on hold. I'm sorry just a lot going on these days for me both good and bad. I will come back but will probably not be very active on the forum.
